clinical_study.brief_title: Treatment Of Short Stature With Genotropin In Children Born Small For Gestational Age Until Final Height
clinical_study.official_title: Genotropin in Short Children Born Small for Gestational Ag - A Long-Term Study in Belgium

brief_summary.textblock: This trial evaluates whether long-term treatment with Genotropin normalizes final (adult) height in short children born small for gestational age

primary_outcome.measure: Final height, compared to the expected familial target height

secondary_outcome.measure: Body weight, body mass index at final height; adverse events and assessment of hematological and clinical chemistry

intervention.intervention_name: Treatment with Genotropin in different dosages

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Participation in the 90-080 study
Exclusion Criteria:
- Any severe, acute or chronic disease
- Any other identifiable reason for short stature
